body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Adair County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Sarah A. Smith. Father of Jeremiah G. Smith, Sarah A. Smith, Agnes Smith Sternes, Thomas B. Smith, Waller Smith, Penick Smith, Joel Smith, Jr., and Willie C. Smith. Owned sixteen enslaved persons in 1860.
